entity.name: playlist
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT playlist.p_id, 'PLAYLIST' AS type, playlist.p_calced_id AS id, playlist.p_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, playlist.p_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, playlist.countInfos, playlist.countImages, playlist.countLocations, playlist.countRoutes, playlist.countTracks, playlist.countTrips, playlist.countVideos, p_name, p_meta_desc, CONCAT(p_name, ' ', p_meta_desc) AS html FROM playlist WHERE p_id IN (SELECT p_id FROM image_playlist UNION SELECT p_id FROM video_playlist) ORDER BY p_name
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT DISTINCT playlist.p_id, 'PLAYLIST' AS type, playlist.p_calced_id AS id, playlist.p_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, playlist.p_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, playlist.countInfos, playlist.countImages, playlist.countLocations, playlist.countRoutes, playlist.countTracks, playlist.countTrips, playlist.countVideos, p_name, p_meta_desc, CONCAT(p_name, ' ', p_meta_desc) AS html FROM playlist WHERE playlist.p_id = '${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT p_id FROM playlist ORDER BY p_id'

entity.name: info
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT info.if_id, 'INFO' AS type, info.if_calced_subtype AS subtype, info.if_calced_id AS id, info.if_calced_linkedplaylists AS linkedplaylists, info.if_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, info.if_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, info.l_id, info.countRoutes, info.countLocations, if_publisher, if_typ, if_url, if_name, if_meta_shortdesc, if_meta_desc, CONCAT(if_name, ' ', if_keywords, ' ', if_meta_shortdesc, ' ', if_meta_desc) AS html, if_keywords, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids FROM info LEFT JOIN location ON info.l_id = location.l_id ORDER BY if_name
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT DISTINCT info.if_id, 'INFO' AS type, info.if_calced_subtype AS subtype, info.if_calced_id AS id, info.if_calced_linkedplaylists AS linkedplaylists, info.if_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, info.if_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, info.l_id, info.countRoutes, info.countLocations, if_publisher, if_typ, if_url, if_name, if_meta_shortdesc, if_meta_desc, CONCAT(if_name, ' ', if_keywords, ' ', if_meta_shortdesc, ' ', if_meta_desc) AS html, if_keywords, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids FROM info LEFT JOIN location ON info.l_id = location.l_id WHERE info.if_id = '${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT if_id FROM info ORDER BY if_id'

entity.name: info_linkedplaylists
entity.query: SELECT playlist.p_id, playlist.p_name, info_playlist.ifp_pos FROM playlist INNER JOIN info_playlist ON playlist.p_id = info_playlist.p_id WHERE info_playlist.if_id IN (${info.if_id}) ORDER BY p_name

entity.name: info_tour
entity.query: SELECT tour.t_id, tour.d_id, t_keywords, tour.t_calced_actiontype AS actiontype FROM info INNER JOIN tour_info ON tour_info.if_id = info.if_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour_info.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE info.if_id IN (${info.if_id})
entity.deltaImportQuery: select t_id, t_keywords FROM tour WHERE t_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: info_destination
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT tour.d_id FROM info INNER JOIN tour_info ON tour_info.if_id = info.if_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour_info.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE info.if_id IN (${info.if_id})
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d_id, t_keywords FROM tour WHERE t_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: info_location
entity.query: SELECT location.l_id, l_lochirarchieids, l_lochirarchietxt FROM info INNER JOIN location_info ON location_info.if_id = info.if_id INNER JOIN location ON location_info.l_id = location.l_id WHERE info.if_id IN (${info.if_id})
entity.deltaImportQuery: select l_id FROM location WHERE l_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: info_destination
entity.query: SELECT destination.d_id, d_keywords, destination.d_calced_actiontype AS actiontype FROM info INNER JOIN tour_info ON tour_info.if_id = info.if_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour_info.t_id = tour.t_id INNER JOIN destination ON destination.d_id=tour.d_id WHERE info.if_id IN (${info.if_id})
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d_id, d_keywords FROM destination WHERE d_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: destination
entity.query: SELECT 'DESTINATION' AS type, destination.d_calced_actiontype AS actiontype, destination.d_calced_actiontype AS subtype, destination.d_calced_id AS id, destination.d_calced_linkedplaylists AS linkedplaylists, destination.d_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, destination.d_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, destination.d_id, destination.l_id, destination.countImages, destination.countImagesTop, destination.countInfos, destination.countNews, destination.countRoutes, destination.countTracks, destination.countTrips, destination.countVideos, d_name, CONCAT( d_name, ' ', d_keywords, ' ', l_lochirarchietxt) AS html, d_dateshow, d_datefirst AS datesort, d_datefirst, DATE_FORMAT(d_datefirst, GET_FORMAT(DATE, 'ISO')) AS dateonly, CONCAT('DONE', (d_datefirst IS NOT NULL)) AS done, d_keywords, d_rate_gesamt, d_gps_lat, d_gps_lon, l_calced_gps_loc AS d_gps_loc, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids, d_k_ids, `D_ELE_MAX` AS altMax, `D_ROUTE_HM` AS altAsc, `D_ROUTE_M` AS dist, `D_ROUTE_DAUER` AS dur, `D_RATE` AS overall, `D_RATE_KS` AS ks, `D_RATE_FIRN` AS firn, `D_RATE_GLETSCHER` AS gletscher, `D_RATE_KLETTERN` AS klettern, `D_RATE_BERGTOUR` AS bergdestination, `D_RATE_SCHNEESCHUH` AS schneeschuh, `D_RATE_AUSDAUER` AS ausdauer, `D_RATE_BILDUNG` AS bildung, `D_RATE_GESAMT` AS gesamt, `D_RATE_KRAFT` AS kraft, `D_RATE_MENTAL` AS mental, `D_RATE_MOTIVE` AS motive, `D_RATE_SCHWIERIGKEIT` AS schwierigkeit, `D_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT` AS wichtigkeit, D_calced_altAscFacet AS altAscFacet, D_calced_altMaxFacet AS altMaxFacet, D_calced_distFacet AS distFacet, D_calced_durFacet AS durFacet, D_DESC_GEBIET AS region, D_DESC_ZIEL AS destloc FROM destination, location WHERE destination.l_id = location.l_id ORDER BY d_datefirst, d_id

entity.name: destination_image
entity.query: (SELECT image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON image.k_id=kategorie_full.k_id INNER JOIN image_playlist ON image.i_id=image_playlist.i_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour.t_id=kategorie_full.t_id WHERE p_id in (18) AND tour.d_id = '${destination.d_id}' AND COALESCE(I_PERSONS, '') = '' ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE desc, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT desc, I_RATE desc, kategorie_full.k_rate_gesamt DESC, image.I_ID desc limit 1 ) UNION (select image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON image.k_id=kategorie_full.k_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour.t_id=kategorie_full.t_id WHERE tour.d_id = '${destination.d_id}' AND COALESCE(I_PERSONS, '') = '' ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE DESC, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT DESC, I_RATE DESC, kategorie_full.k_rate_gesamt DESC, I_ID DESC limit 1)
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image WHERE i_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: destination_track
entity.query: SELECT kategorie_full.k_id, tr_id, n_id, k_dateshow, k_datevon, k_calced_week AS week, k_calced_month AS month, k_calced_year AS year, k_persons, k_objects FROM kategorie_full INNER JOIN kategorie_tour ON kategorie_tour.k_id = kategorie_full.k_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour.t_id=kategorie_tour.t_id WHERE tour.d_id = '${destination.d_id}' ORDER BY k_datevon asc
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT k_id, tr_id, n_id, k_dateshow, k_datevon, k_calced_week AS week, k_calced_month AS month, k_calced_year AS year, k_persons, k_objects FROM kategorie_full WHERE k_id = '${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: destination_tour
entity.query: select t_id FROM tour WHERE d_id in ('${destination.d_id}')
entity.deltaImportQuery: select t_id FROM tour WHERE t_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: destination_linkedinfos
entity.query: SELECT info.if_id FROM info INNER JOIN tour_info ON tour_info.if_id = info.if_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour_info.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE tour.d_id = "${destination.d_id}" ORDER BY if_name

entity.name: destination_poi
entity.query: SELECT poi.poi_id FROM poi INNER JOIN tour_poi ON tour_poi.poi_id = poi.poi_id INNER JOIN tour ON tour_poi.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE tour.d_id = '${destination.d_id}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select poi_id FROM poi WHERE poi_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: track_linkedplaylists
entity.query: SELECT playlist.p_id, playlist.p_name, kategorie_playlist.kp_pos FROM playlist INNER JOIN kategorie_playlist ON playlist.p_id = kategorie_playlist.p_id WHERE kategorie_playlist.k_id IN (${track.k_id}) ORDER BY p_name

entity.name: track_linkedroutes
entity.query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT k_route_attr as kt_route_attr FROM tour INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON kategorie_full.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE kategorie_full.k_id IN (${track.k_id}) UNION SELECT kt_route_attr FROM tour INNER JOIN kategorie_tour ON kategorie_tour.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE kategorie_tour.k_id IN (${track.k_id}) ) routessrc GROUP BY kt_route_attr ORDER BY kt_route_attr

entity.name: track_image
entity.query: (select image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image INNER JOIN image_playlist ON image.i_id=image_playlist.i_id WHERE p_id in (18) AND image.k_id IN ('${track.k_id}') ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE desc, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT desc, I_RATE desc, image.I_ID desc limit 1 ) UNION (select image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image WHERE image.k_id IN ('${track.k_id}') ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE desc, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT desc, I_RATE desc, I_ID desc limit 1)
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image WHERE i_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: track_tour
entity.deltaImportQuery: select t_id FROM tour WHERE t_id=${dih.delta.id}

entity.name: track_destination
entity.query: select destination.d_id FROM destination INNER JOIN tour ON tour.d_id=destination.d_id INNER JOIN kategorie_tour ON kategorie_tour.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE kategorie_tour.k_id = ${track.k_id}
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d_id FROM destination WHERE d_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: track_poi
entity.query: SELECT poi.poi_id FROM poi INNER JOIN kategorie_poi ON kategorie_poi.poi_id = poi.poi_id INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON kategorie_poi.k_id = kategorie_full.k_id WHERE kategorie_full.k_id IN (${track.k_id})
entity.deltaImportQuery: select poi_id FROM poi WHERE poi_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: trip
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT trip.tr_id, 'TRIP' AS type, trip.tr_calced_id AS id, trip.tr_calced_linkedplaylists AS linkedplaylists, trip.tr_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, trip.tr_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, trip.l_id, trip.countImages, trip.countImagesTop, trip.countRoutes, trip.countTracks, trip.countVideos, tr_dateshow, tr_datevon AS datesort, tr_datevon, tr_calced_dateonly AS dateonly, CONCAT('DONE', (tr_datevon IS NOT NULL)) AS done, TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(tr_datebis, tr_datevon)) / 3600 AS dur, tr_name, tr_meta_shortdesc_md, tr_meta_shortdesc_html, tr_meta_shortdesc_html AS tr_meta_shortdesc_html2, CONCAT(tr_name, ' ', tr_keywords, ' ', tr_meta_shortdesc_md) AS html, tr_keywords, tr_persons, tr_objects, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids, SUM(K_ALTITUDE_ASC) AS altAsc, SUM(K_ALTITUDE_DESC) AS altDesc, MAX(K_ALTITUDE_MAX) AS altMax, MAX(ROUND((K_ALTITUDE_MAX / 500)) * 500) AS altMaxFacet, MIN(K_ALTITUDE_MIN) AS altMin, MIN(ROUND((K_ALTITUDE_MIN / 500)) * 500) AS altMinFacet, SUM(K_DISTANCE) AS dist FROM trip inner join kategorie_full ON trip.tr_id = kategorie_full.tr_id LEFT JOIN location ON trip.l_id = location.l_id GROUP BY trip.tr_id, type, id, tr_dateshow, datesort, tr_datevon, dateonly, dur, tr_name, tr_meta_shortdesc_md, tr_meta_shortdesc_html, tr_meta_shortdesc_html2, html, tr_keywords, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids ORDER BY tr_datevon

entity.query: SELECT playlist.p_id, playlist.p_name, trip_playlist.trp_pos AS linkedplaylists FROM playlist INNER JOIN trip_playlist ON playlist.p_id = trip_playlist.p_id WHERE trip_playlist.tr_id IN (${trip.tr_id}) ORDER BY p_name

entity.name: trip_image
entity.query: (select image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image INNER JOIN image_playlist ON image.i_id=image_playlist.i_id INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON image.k_id=kategorie_full.k_id WHERE p_id in (18) AND kategorie_full.tr_id in (${trip.tr_id}) AND COALESCE(I_PERSONS, '') = '' ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE desc, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT desc, I_RATE desc, kategorie_full.k_rate_gesamt DESC, image.I_ID desc limit 1 ) UNION (select image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON image.k_id=kategorie_full.k_id WHERE kategorie_full.tr_id in (${trip.tr_id}) AND COALESCE(I_PERSONS, '') = '' ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE DESC, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT DESC, I_RATE DESC, kategorie_full.k_rate_gesamt DESC, I_ID DESC limit 1)
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url FROM image WHERE i_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: trip_tour
entity.query: SELECT t_id, d_id, t_keywords, tour.t_calced_actiontype AS actiontype FROM tour WHERE t_id in (select t_id FROM kategorie_full WHERE tr_id in (${trip.tr_id}))
entity.deltaImportQuery: select t_id, t_keywords FROM tour WHERE t_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: trip_destination
entity.query: SELECT destination.d_id, d_keywords, destination.d_calced_actiontype AS actiontype FROM destination inner join tour ON destination.d_id=tour.d_id WHERE t_id in (select t_id FROM kategorie_full WHERE tr_id in (${trip.tr_id}))
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d_id, d_keywords FROM destination WHERE d_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: trip_track
entity.query: SELECT kategorie_full.l_id, k_id, n_id, k_calced_actiontype AS actiontype, k_dateshow, k_datevon, k_calced_week AS week, k_calced_month AS month, k_calced_year AS year, t_id, k_keywords, k_persons, k_objects, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids FROM kategorie_full, location WHERE kategorie_full.l_id = location.l_id AND tr_id in (${trip.tr_id}) ORDER BY k_datevon asc
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT kategorie_full.l_id, k_id, n_id, k_calced_actiontype AS actiontype, k_dateshow, k_datevon, k_calced_week AS week, k_calced_month AS month, k_calced_year AS year, t_id, k_keywords, k_persons, k_objects, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids FROM kategorie_full, location WHERE kategorie_full.l_id = location.l_id AND k_id = '${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: news
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT news.n_id, 'NEWS' AS type, news.n_calced_id AS id, news.n_calced_linkedplaylists AS linkedplaylists, news.n_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, news.n_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, news.countImages, news.countImagesTop, news.countRoutes, news.countTracks, news.countTrips, news.countVideos, n_date, n_date AS dateshow, DATE_FORMAT(n_date, GET_FORMAT(DATE, 'ISO')) AS dateonly, CONCAT('DONE', (n_date IS NOT NULL)) AS done, n_headline, n_message_md, n_message_html, n_message_html AS n_message_html2, CONCAT(n_headline, ' ', n_keywords, ' ', n_message_html) AS html, n_keywords, n_persons, n_objects, SUM(K_ALTITUDE_ASC) AS altAsc, SUM(K_ALTITUDE_DESC) AS altDesc, MAX(K_ALTITUDE_MAX) AS altMax, MAX(ROUND((K_ALTITUDE_MAX / 500)) * 500) AS altMaxFacet, MIN(K_ALTITUDE_MIN) AS altMin, MIN(ROUND((K_ALTITUDE_MIN / 500)) * 500) AS altMinFacet, SUM(K_DISTANCE) AS dist FROM news LEFT JOIN kategorie_full ON news.n_id = kategorie_full.n_id GROUP BY news.n_id, type, id, n_date, dateshow, dateonly, n_headline, n_message_md, n_message_html, n_message_html2, html, n_keywords ORDER BY n_date
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT DISTINCT news.n_id, 'NEWS' AS type, news.n_calced_id AS id, news.n_calced_linkedplaylists AS linkedplaylists, news.n_calced_navigation_objects AS navigation_objects, news.n_calced_extended_object_properties AS extended_object_properties, news.countImages, news.countImagesTop, news.countRoutes, news.countTracks, news.countTrips, news.countVideos, n_date, n_date AS dateshow, DATE_FORMAT(n_date, GET_FORMAT(DATE, 'ISO')) AS dateonly, CONCAT('DONE', (n_date IS NOT NULL)) AS done, n_headline, n_message_md, n_message_html, n_message_html AS n_message_html2, CONCAT(n_headline, ' ', n_keywords, ' ', n_message_html) AS html, n_keywords, n_persons, n_objects, SUM(K_ALTITUDE_ASC) AS altAsc, SUM(K_ALTITUDE_DESC) AS altDesc, MAX(K_ALTITUDE_MAX) AS altMax, MAX(ROUND((K_ALTITUDE_MAX / 500)) * 500) AS altMaxFacet, MIN(K_ALTITUDE_MIN) AS altMin, MIN(ROUND((K_ALTITUDE_MIN / 500)) * 500) AS altMinFacet, SUM(K_DISTANCE) AS dist FROM news LEFT JOIN kategorie_full ON news.n_id = kategorie_full.n_id WHERE news.n_id = '${dih.delta.id}' GROUP BY news.n_id, type, id, n_date, dateshow, dateonly, n_headline, n_message_md, n_message_html, n_message_html2, html, n_keywords
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT n_id FROM news ORDER BY n_id'

entity.name: news_image
entity.query: (select image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image INNER JOIN image_playlist ON image.i_id=image_playlist.i_id INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON image.k_id=kategorie_full.k_id WHERE p_id in (18) AND kategorie_full.n_id in (${news.n_id}) AND COALESCE(I_PERSONS, '') = '' ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE desc, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT desc, I_RATE desc, kategorie_full.k_rate_gesamt DESC, image.I_ID desc limit 1 ) UNION (select image.i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url, i_persons, i_objects FROM image INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON image.k_id=kategorie_full.k_id WHERE kategorie_full.n_id in (${news.n_id}) AND COALESCE(I_PERSONS, '') = '' ORDER BY I_RATE_MOTIVE DESC, I_RATE_WICHTIGKEIT DESC, I_RATE DESC, kategorie_full.k_rate_gesamt DESC, I_ID DESC limit 1)
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT i_id, i_date, i_calced_path AS i_url FROM image WHERE i_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: news_tour
entity.query: SELECT tour.t_id, tour.d_id, t_keywords, tour.t_calced_actiontype AS actiontype FROM news INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON (kategorie_full.n_id = news.n_id) INNER JOIN kategorie_tour ON kategorie_tour.k_id = kategorie_full.k_id INNER JOIN tour ON kategorie_tour.t_id = tour.t_id WHERE news.n_id IN (${news.n_id})
entity.deltaImportQuery: select t_id, t_keywords FROM tour WHERE t_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: news_destination
entity.query: SELECT destination.d_id, d_keywords, destination.d_calced_actiontype AS actiontype FROM news INNER JOIN kategorie_full ON (kategorie_full.n_id = news.n_id) INNER JOIN kategorie_tour ON kategorie_tour.k_id = kategorie_full.k_id INNER JOIN tour ON kategorie_tour.t_id = tour.t_id INNER JOIN destination ON destination.d_id=tour.d_id WHERE news.n_id IN (${news.n_id})
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d_id, d_keywords FROM destination WHERE d_id='${dih.delta.id}'

entity.name: news_track
entity.query: SELECT kategorie_full.l_id, k_id, tr_id, k_dateshow, k_datevon, k_calced_week AS week, k_calced_month AS month, k_calced_year AS year, t_id, k_keywords, k_persons, k_objects, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids FROM kategorie_full, location WHERE kategorie_full.l_id = location.l_id AND n_id in (${news.n_id}) ORDER BY k_datevon asc
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT kategorie_full.l_id, k_id, tr_id, k_dateshow, k_datevon, k_calced_week AS week, k_calced_month AS month, k_calced_year AS year, t_id, k_keywords, k_persons, k_objects, l_lochirarchietxt, l_lochirarchieids FROM kategorie_full, location WHERE kategorie_full.l_id = location.l_id AND k_id = '${dih.delta.id}'
